TEAMS.CAN_MANAGE_TEAM: The user can edit the team settings and manage the team members
TEAMS.DELETION_OPERATION_FAILED: The operation failed; make sure the user doesn't have active memberships in other services
TEAMS.EMAIL_TO_INVITE: The email address of the user
TEAMS.INVITE_USER_HINT: Invite a member to the team
TEAMS.IS_OWNER: The user is the current owner of the team

TEAMS.PENDING_INVITATION: The user has been invited in the team but hasn't accepted yet
TEAMS.TEAM_NOT_ACTIVATED_DISCLAIMER: Team has not been activated for this product; contact an administrator.
TEAMS.TAP_TO_ACTIVATE_ON_PROJECT_: Tap to activate the team on {{project}}!
TEAMS.USER_NOT_FOUND_OR_ALREADY_JOINED: The user is already part of the team
TEAMS.YOU_NEED_A_TEAM_TO_CONTINUE: You need a team to continue

TEAMS.TEAM_DELETION_ARE_YOU_SURE: You won't be able to recover the data related to the team anymore. The operation is irreversible!
